name: Deigah Demo
description:
Big-time company boss and almost heartless Percy is having a bad day! The company isn't doing so well and it's all Brian's fault! But things aren't what they seem with him. Murder, loss, the supernatural, swearing and comedy all rolled into one story driven tale of a man just trying to do the right thing.

Note

This is just a 5/10  minute playthrough of what I've created so far, I'm learning more about the programme and it's features as I go and plan to add more! I am completely open to support and criticism, as well as ideas to do with combat etc. so feel free to reach out and contact me if this interests you!
